utils.video
Class ImageManipulator

java.lang.Object
  utils.video.ImageManipulator

public class ImageManipulator
extends java.lang.Object

Collection of static methods to handle images and convert between different representations (int rgb, byte rgb, int grayscale ..).

Author:
Creative

intRGB2ByteRGB

public static byte[] intRGB2ByteRGB(int[] int_arr)
Converts an int[] RGB image to byte[] RGB image.

Parameters:
int_arr - input image
Returns:
converted image as an array of bytes

grayByteArray2RGBByteArray

public byte[] grayByteArray2RGBByteArray(byte[] gray_arr)
Converts a byte[] Grayscale image to a byte[] RGB image. notice that the size of the output RGB image is triple that of the input Grayscale image.

Parameters:
gray_arr - input grayscale byte array
Returns:
RGB byte array image

Parameters:

width - image's width
height - image's height
Returns:
two dimensional integer array image

Gets the Grayscale value for an RGB value.

Parameters:
r - Red
g - Green
b - Blue
Returns:
Grayscale value

gray2RGBInt

public static int[] gray2RGBInt(byte[] gray_arr)
Converts a byte[] Grayscale image to int[] RGB image (representation changes, but the image remains Gray colors).

Parameters:
gray_arr - input Grayscale image
Returns:
integer array of the RGB image
